login-no-account: We couldn't find an account with the given email and password.
forgot-login-message: I forgot my username or password
invalid-phone-format: Invalid phone number, include country code and phone number
password-8-characters: Password must be at least 8 characters
password-1-uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password-1-lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password-1-number: Password must contain at least one number
password-1-special: Password must contain at least one special character
degree-3-characters: Degree must be at least 3 characters
institution-3-characters: Institution must be at least 3 characters
address-3-characters: Address must be at least 3 characters
city-2-characters: City must be at least 2 characters
state-2-characters: State must be at least 2 characters
postcode-5-characters: Postcode must be at least 5 characters
postcode-10-max-characters: Postcode must be at most 10 characters
deny-request-question: Are you sure you want to deny {{name}}'s request?
deny-directory-action-warning: This action is irreversible. They will remain part of the counselor database but will not appear in the directory. To be added, they will need to submit a new request.
approve-request-question: Approve {{name}}'s request to be part of the directory?
approve-directory-action-warning: The counselor will be approved and added to the directory. Any future updates will require manual update.
invite-admin-action-warning: They'll have access to manage counselors, create announcements, and moderating discussions.
remove-admin-question: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}} as an admin?
remove-admin-action-warning: {{name}} will remain as a genetic counselor but will lose all admin privileges. To make them an admin again, you will have to resend an invitation.
one-language-required: At least one language is required
one-language-required-default-english: At least one language is required. Defaulting to English.
